title: Only You, Butterfly
description: When the man she spent the previous night ogling during her first concert comes into the diner where she works, Arianna Morris’ curiosity flares. She waits on him, never suspecting she was the reason he was there. Tom Calloway, the blond haired blue-eyed lead singer of Distracted, fell hard and fast for the freckle-faced redhead riding the rail at his concert. Wanting more than a one - night stand, he pursues and persuades her to join him on tour by promising a ‘no pressure’ relationship.Determined to claim forever with her, Tom overcomes her insecurities only to have a freak spiral of fate change everything. Faced with a situation he cannot control, Tom hopes she remembers his words…  “Only You, Butterfly.”
author: Rae Spencer
